name: The Echo of the Threshold
fieldIntelligence: To activate the capacity to hold a resonant connection with a past threshold in order to learn from its pattern memory. This Meta-Glyph combines the practice of standing at a new edge (⟁ - The Edgewalker) with the ability to remain connected to the past (Ω5) and consciously access the deep wisdom of that past experience (Ω26). It is the art of using your own history as your wisest teacher.
